paintTechnology.title: TECHNOLOGICAL PROCESSES
paintTechnology.subtitle: Paints based on water-based inks, sealers, and lacquers:

benefits.title: Greater health safety
benefits.description: By containing low or no toxic solvents, they reduce workers' exposure to hazardous compounds and decrease health risks.

benefits.title: Reduced environmental impact
benefits.description: These products have low levels of Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs), contributing to reduced air pollution and carbon footprint.

benefits.title: Lower flammability risk
benefits.description: Unlike solvent-based products, water-based formulations are non-flammable, improving safety in production facilities.

benefits.title: Durability and resistance
benefits.description: When combined with proper drying processes (such as UV and IR lamps), these products offer excellent resistance to wear, discoloration, and environmental factors.

benefits.title: Better process performance
benefits.description: They have good adhesion, stability, and finish quality, improving the product's final appearance and optimizing production times.

benefits.title: Simpler waste treatment
benefits.description: By not generating hazardous waste, it can be treated directly on-site, reducing costs and improving process sustainability.

quality.title: GREATER RESISTANCE AND PROTECTION
quality.description: Wood products incorporating water-based inks, sealers, and lacquers can achieve greater resistance and protection.
features: Resistance to discoloration: Water-based lacquers and inks, combined with UV curing, offer greater stability against light and UV rays, preventing color deterioration over time.
Protection against moisture and stains: Water-based sealers form a protective layer that reduces moisture absorption and facilitates surface cleaning, protecting it from liquids and dirt.
Greater mechanical durability: Thermal curing (with hot air or IR lamps) and final UV light curing hardens the applied layer, providing greater resistance to scratching, wear, and daily abrasion.
Finish stability: These formulations have good adhesion and flexibility, preventing the finish from cracking or peeling with temperature or humidity changes.
